author: Tom Nicholas
description:
Want to restore the planet’s ecosystems and see your impact in monthly videos? The first 100 people to join Planet Wild with my code TOM8 will get the first month for free at: https://planetwild.com/r/tomnicholas/join 

If you want to get to know them better first, check out their project rescuing baby seals https://planetwild.com/r/tomnicholas/m30 

British politics is broken. A deeply unpopular government. Mind-boggling policy decisions. And an insurgent far-right. But how did we get here?

Written, directed, and presented by Tom Nicholas.
Filmed and edited by Georgia Burrows.
Additional research, writing and production assistance by Jack Carter.

*Chapters*

00:00 Nigel and Keir
06:00 Part One: Life’s a Riot
13:48 Part Two: Rising Stars
20:43: Part Three: Leaving and Remaining
27:01 Part Four: Centre and Periphery
34:04 Part Five: The Leader and the Loser
43:48 Part Six: Taking Over
53:35 Part Seven: Spot the Difference
55:51 Planet Wild

Watch this video ad- and sponsor-free on Ne
title: Nigel vs. Keir: How British Politics Fell Apart
